   22: 
   23: -module(ssl_trace_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_api.hrl").
   28: 
   29: -export([suite/0,
   30:          all/0,
   31:          init_per_suite/1,
   32:          end_per_suite/1,
   33:          init_per_testcase/2,
   34:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   35: 
   36: -export([tc_basic/0,
   37:          tc_basic/1,
   38:          tc_no_trace/0,
   39:          tc_no_trace/1,
   40:          tc_api_profile/0,
   41:          tc_api_profile/1,
   42:          tc_rle_profile/0,
   43:          tc_rle_profile/1,
   44:          tc_budget_option/0,
   45:          tc_budget_option/1,
   46:          tc_file_option/0,
   47:          tc_file_option/1,
   48:          tc_write/0,
   49:          tc_write/1,
   50:          tc_check_profiles/0,
   51:          tc_check_profiles/1]).
   52: -define(TRACE_FILE, "ssl_trace.txt").
   53: 
   54: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   56: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   57: suite() -> [{timetrap,{seconds,60}}].
   58: 
   59: all() -> [tc_basic, tc_no_trace, tc_api_profile, tc_rle_profile,
   60:           tc_budget_option, tc_write, tc_file_option, tc_check_profiles].
   61: 
   62: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   63:     catch application:stop(crypto),
   64:     try application:start(crypto) of
   65: 	ok ->
   66: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
   67:             ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config)
   68:     catch _:_ ->
   69: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
   70:     end.
   71: 
   72: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   73:     ssl:stop(),
   74:     application:stop(crypto).
   75: 
   76: init_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
   77:     Config.
   78: 
   79: end_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
   80:     ssl_trace:stop(),
   81:     Config.
   82: 
   83: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   84: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
   85: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   86: tc_basic() ->
   87:     [{doc, "Basic test of ssl_trace API"}].
   88: tc_basic(_Config) ->
   89:     {ok, L0} = ssl_trace:start(),
   90:     true = is_pid(whereis(ssl_trace)),
   91:     true = is_list(L0),
   92:     {ok,L0} = ssl_trace:on(),
   93:     {ok,L0} = ssl_trace:on(),
   94:     L0 = ssl_trace:is_on(),
   95:     [] = ssl_trace:is_off(),
   96: 
   97:     L1 = [hd(L0)],
   98:     L2 = tl(L0),
   99:     {ok,L1} = ssl_trace:off(L2),
  100: 
  101:     L1 = ssl_trace:is_on(),
  102:     L2 = ssl_trace:is_off(),
  103: 
  104:     {ok,[]} = ssl_trace:off(),
  105:     {ok,[]} = ssl_trace:off(),
  106: 
  107:     [] = ssl_trace:is_on(),
  108:     L0 = ssl_trace:is_off(),
  109:     ok = ssl_trace:stop(),
  110:     undefined = whereis(ssl_trace),
  111: 
  112:     {ok, EnabledProfiles} = ssl_trace:start(),
  113:     [true = lists:member(ExpectedProfile, EnabledProfiles) ||
  114:         ExpectedProfile <- [api, crt, csp, hbn, kdt, rle, ssn]],
  115:     {ok, [api]} = ssl_trace:on(api),
  116:     {ok, []} = ssl_trace:off(api),
  117:     ok = ssl_trace:stop(),
  118:     ok.
  119: 
  120: tc_no_trace() ->
  121:     [{doc, "Verify there are no traces if not enabled"}].
  122: tc_no_trace(Config) ->
  123:     Ref = ssl_trace_start(),
  124:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  125:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  126:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  127:     ExpectedTraces =
  128:         #{call => [], processed => [], exception_from => [], return_from => []},
  129:     ExpectedTraces = receive_map(Ref),
  130:     ok = ssl_trace:stop(),
  131:     ok.
  132: 
  133: tc_api_profile() ->
  134:     [{doc, "Verify traces for 'api' trace profile"}].
  135: tc_api_profile(Config) ->
  136:     On = [api, rle],
  137:     Off = [],
  138:     TracesAfterConnect =
  139:         #{
  140:           call =>
  141:               [{"    (server) -> ssl:handshake/2", ssl, handshake},
  142:                {"    (server) -> tls_server_connection:initial_hello/3",
  143:                 tls_server_connection, initial_hello},
  144:                {"    (client) -> tls_client_connection:initial_hello/3",
  145:                 tls_client_connection, initial_hello}],
  146:          return_from =>
  147:               [{"    (server) <- ssl:listen/2 returned", ssl, listen},
  148:                {"    (server) <- tls_server_connection:initial_hello/3 returned",
  149:                 tls_server_connection, initial_hello},
  150:                {"    (client) <- tls_client_connection:initial_hello/3 returned",
  151:                 tls_client_connection, initial_hello},
  152:                {"    (client) <- ssl_gen_statem:connect/8 returned",
  153:                 ssl_gen_statem, connect},
  154:                {"    (client) <- ssl:connect/3 returned", ssl, connect},
  155:                {"    (server) <- ssl:handshake/2 returned", ssl, handshake},
  156:                {"    (client) <- tls_sender:init/3 returned", tls_sender, init},
  157:                {"    (server) <- tls_sender:init/3 returned", tls_sender, init}],
  158:           processed =>
  159:               ["rle ('?') -> ssl_gen_statem:init/1 (*client)",
  160:                "rle ('?') -> ssl_gen_statem:init/1 (*server)",
  161:                "rle ('?') -> ssl:listen/2 (*server) Args",
  162:                "rle ('?') -> ssl:connect/3 (*client) Args",
  163:                "rle ('?') -> tls_sender:init/3 (*server)",
  164:                "rle ('?') -> tls_sender:init/3 (*client)",
  165:                "api (client) -> ssl_gen_statem:connect/8"]},
  166:     TracesAfterDisconnect =
  167:         #{
  168:           call =>
  169:               [{"    (client) -> ssl:close/1", ssl, close},
  170:                {"    (client) -> ssl:close/1", ssl, close},
  171:                {"    (client) -> ssl_gen_statem:close/2", ssl_gen_statem, close},
  172:                {"    (client) -> ssl_gen_statem:terminate_alert/1",
  173:                 ssl_gen_statem, terminate_alert},
  174:                {"    (server) -> ssl:close/1", ssl, close},
  175:                {"    (server) -> ssl_gen_statem:close/2", ssl_gen_statem, close},
  176:                {"    (server) -> ssl_gen_statem:terminate_alert/1",
  177:                 ssl_gen_statem, terminate_alert}],
  178:          return_from =>
  179:               [{"    (client) <- ssl:close/1 returned", ssl, close},
  180:                {"    (client) <- ssl:close/1 returned", ssl, close},
  181:                {"    (client) <- ssl_gen_statem:close/2 returned",
  182:                 ssl_gen_statem, close},
  183:                {"    (client) <- ssl_gen_statem:terminate_alert/1 returned",
  184:                 ssl_gen_statem, terminate_alert},
  185:                {"    (server) <- ssl:close/1 returned", ssl, close},
  186:                {"    (server) <- ssl_gen_statem:close/2 returned",
  187:                 ssl_gen_statem, close},
  188:                {"    (server) <- ssl_gen_statem:terminate_alert/1 returned",
  189:                 ssl_gen_statem, terminate_alert}],
  190:           exception_from =>
  191:               [{"    (server) exception_from ssl_gen_statem:init/1  {exit,{shutdown,normal}}",
  192:                 ssl_gen_statem, init},
  193:                {"    (client) exception_from ssl_gen_statem:init/1  {exit,{shutdown,normal}}",
  194:                 ssl_gen_statem, init}]},
  195:     Ref = ssl_trace_start(),
  196:     {ok, On} = ssl_trace:on(On),
  197:     Delta = On -- Off,
  198:     {ok, Delta} = ssl_trace:off(Off),
  199:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  200:     UnhandledTraceCnt1 =
  201:         #{call => 2, processed => 0, exception_from => no_trace_received,
  202:           return_from => 2},
  203:     check_trace_map(Ref, TracesAfterConnect, UnhandledTraceCnt1),
  204:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  205:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  206:     %% terminate_alert will get called twice by both client and
  207:     %% server to strip away Details from {shutdown::Reason, Detatils}
  208:     %% before matching the Reason
  209:     UnhandledTraceCnt2 =
  210:         #{call => 2, processed => no_trace_received, exception_from => 0,
  211:           return_from => 2},
  212:     check_trace_map(Ref, TracesAfterDisconnect, UnhandledTraceCnt2),
  213:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  214:     ok.
  215: 
  216: tc_rle_profile() ->
  217:     [{doc, "Verify traces for 'rle' trace profile"}].
  218: tc_rle_profile(Config) ->
  219:     On = [rle],
  220:     ExpectedTraces =
  221:         #{
  222:           call =>
  223:               [],
  224:          return_from =>
  225:               [{"    (client) <- ssl:connect/3 returned", ssl, connect},
  226:                {"    (server) <- ssl:listen/2 returned", ssl, listen},
  227:                {"    (client) <- tls_sender:init/3 returned", tls_sender, init},
  228:                {"    (server) <- tls_sender:init/3 returned", tls_sender, init}],
  229:           processed =>
  230:               ["rle ('?') -> ssl:listen/2 (*server) Args =",
  231:                "rle ('?') -> ssl:connect/3 (*client) Args",
  232:                "rle ('?') -> ssl_gen_statem:init/1 (*server) Args = [[server",
  233:                "rle ('?') -> ssl_gen_statem:init/1 (*client) Args = [[client",
  234:                "rle ('?') -> tls_sender:init/3 (*server)",
  235:                "rle ('?') -> tls_sender:init/3 (*client)"]},
  236:     Ref = ssl_trace_start(),
  237:     {ok, On} = ssl_trace:on(On),
  238:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  239:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  240:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  241:     UnhandledTraceCnt =
  242:         #{call => no_trace_received, processed => 0, exception_from => 2,
  243:           return_from => 0},
  244:     check_trace_map(Ref, ExpectedTraces, UnhandledTraceCnt),
  245:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  246:     ok.
  247: 
  248: tc_budget_option() ->
  249:     [{doc, "Verify that budget option limits amount of traces"}].
  250: tc_budget_option(Config) ->
  251:     Ref = ssl_trace_start(make_ref(), [{budget, 10}]),
  252:     {ok, [api,rle]} = ssl_trace:on([api,rle]),
  253:     ssl_trace:write("Not a trace from dbg - not included in budget", []),
  254:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  255:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  256:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  257:     CountReceived = fun(Reference) ->
  258:                             ReceiveStats = check_trace_map(Reference, #{}),
  259:                             ReceivedNumbers =
  260:                                 lists:filter(fun is_number/1,
  261:                                              maps:values(ReceiveStats)),
  262:                             lists:sum(ReceivedNumbers)
  263:                     end,
  264:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  265:     ExpectedTraceCnt = 10,
  266:     ActualTraceCnt = CountReceived(Ref),
  267:     case ExpectedTraceCnt == ActualTraceCnt of
  268:         true ->
  269:             ok;
  270:         _ ->
  271:             ?CT_FAIL("Expected ~w traces, but found ~w",
  272:                   [ExpectedTraceCnt, ActualTraceCnt])
  273:     end.
  274: 
  275: tc_file_option() ->
  276:     [{doc, "Verify that file option redirects traces to file"}].
  277: tc_file_option(Config) ->
  278:     _Ref = ssl_trace_start(make_ref(), [{budget, 10}, file]),
  279:     {ok, [api,rle]} = ssl_trace:on([api,rle]),
  280:     [Server, Client] = ssl_connect(Config),
  281:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  282:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
  283:     ActualTraceCnt = count_line(?TRACE_FILE),
  284:     ExpectedTraceCnt = 11, %% budget + 1 message about end of budget
  285:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  286:     case ExpectedTraceCnt == ActualTraceCnt of
  287:         true ->
  288:             ok;
  289:         _ ->
  290:             ?CT_FAIL("Expected ~w traces, but found ~w",
  291:                   [ExpectedTraceCnt, ActualTraceCnt])
  292:     end.
  293: 
  294: tc_write() ->
  295:     [{doc, "Verify that custom messages can be written"}].
  296: tc_write(_Config) ->
  297:     _Ref = ssl_trace_start(make_ref(), [{budget, 10}, file]),
  298:     {ok, [api,rle]} = ssl_trace:on([api,rle]),
  299:     ssl_trace:write("Custom trace message ~w", [msg]),
  300:     ActualTraceCnt = count_line(?TRACE_FILE),
  301:     ExpectedTraceCnt = 1,
  302:     ssl_trace:stop(),
  303:     case ExpectedTraceCnt == ActualTraceCnt of
  304:         true ->
  305:             ok;
  306:         _ ->
  307:             ?CT_FAIL("Expected ~w traces, but found ~w",
  308:                   [ExpectedTraceCnt, ActualTraceCnt])
  309:     end.
  310: 
  311: tc_check_profiles() ->
  312:     [{doc, "Verify that trace profile contain valid functions"}].
  313: tc_check_profiles(_Config) ->
  314:     CheckFun =
  315:         fun(Profile, Module, Fun, DefinedFunctions) ->
  316:                 case lists:member(Fun, DefinedFunctions) of
  317:                     true -> ok;
  318:                     _ ->
  319:                         {F, A} = Fun,
  320:                         ct:fail("~w:~w/~w from '~w' trace profile not found",
  321:                                 [Module, F, A, Profile])
  322:                 end
  323:         end,
  324:     CheckModule =
  325:         fun(Profile, {Module, Funs}) ->
  326:                 DefinedFunctions = Module:module_info(functions),
  327:                 [CheckFun(Profile, Module, F, DefinedFunctions) ||
  328:                     F <- Funs]
  329:         end,
  330:     CheckTProfile =
  331:         fun({Profile, _, _, ModFunsTuples}) ->
  332:                 [CheckModule(Profile, MFTuple) ||
  333:                     MFTuple <- ModFunsTuples]
  334:         end,
  335:     [CheckTProfile(P) || P <- ssl_trace:trace_profiles()],
  336:     ok.
  337: 
  338: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  339: ssl_trace_start() ->
  340:     ssl_trace_start(make_ref(), []).
  341: 
  342: ssl_trace_start(Ref, TraceOpts) ->
  343:     TestProcess = self(),
  344:     {ok, [_|_]} = ssl_trace:start(fun(Format,Args) ->
  345:                                           ct:log(Format, Args),
  346:                                           TestProcess ! {Ref, Args}
  347:                                   end,
  348:                                   TraceOpts),
  349:     Ref.
  350: 
  351: receive_map(Ref) ->
  352:     Empty = #{call => [], return_from => [], exception_from => [],
  353:               processed => []},
  354:     receive_map(Ref, Empty).
  355: 
  356: receive_map(Ref,
  357:                Map = #{call := Call, return_from := Return,
  358:                        exception_from := Exception, processed := Processed}) ->
  359:     receive
  360:         {Ref, Msg = [_, {call, {_, _, _}}, _]} ->
  361:             receive_map(Ref, Map#{call => [Msg|Call]});
  362:         {Ref, Msg = [_, {return_from, {_, _, _}, _}, _]} ->
  363:             receive_map(Ref, Map#{return_from => [Msg|Return]});
  364:         {Ref, Msg = [_, {exception_from, {_, _, _}, _}, _]} ->
  365:             receive_map(Ref, Map#{exception_from => [Msg|Exception]});
  366:         {Ref, Msg = [_Timestamp, _Pid, _ExpectString]} ->
  367:             %% processed means a trace was processed by Module:handle_trace
  368:             %% function and is not received as a trace tuple
  369:             receive_map(Ref, Map#{processed => [Msg|Processed]})
  370:     after 5000 ->
  371:             Map
  372:     end.
  373: 
  374: check_trace_map(Ref, ExpectedTraces) ->
  375:     Received = receive_map(Ref),
  376:     L = [check_key(Type, ExpectedTraces, maps:get(Type, Received)) ||
  377:             Type <- maps:keys(Received)],
  378:     maps:from_list(L).
  379: 
  380: check_trace_map(Ref, ExpectedTraces, ExpectedRemainders) ->
  381:     ActualRemainders = check_trace_map(Ref, ExpectedTraces),
  382:     case ExpectedRemainders == ActualRemainders of
  383:         true ->
  384:             ok;
  385:         _ ->
  386:             ?CT_FAIL("Expected trace remainders = ~w ~n"
  387:                  "Actual trace remainders = ~w",
  388:                  [ExpectedRemainders, ActualRemainders])
  389:     end.
  390: 
  391: check_key(Type, ExpectedTraces, ReceivedPerType) ->
  392:     ReceivedPerTypeCnt = length(ReceivedPerType),
  393:     ?CT_LOG("Received Type = ~w Messages# = ~w", [Type, ReceivedPerTypeCnt]),
  394:     case ReceivedPerTypeCnt > 0 of
  395:         true ->
  396:             ExpectedPerType = maps:get(Type, ExpectedTraces, []),
  397:             ExpectedPerTypeCnt = length(ExpectedPerType),
  398:             check_trace(Type, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType),
  399:             {Type, ReceivedPerTypeCnt - ExpectedPerTypeCnt};
  400:         _ ->
  401:             {Type, no_trace_received}
  402:     end.
  403: 
  404: -define(CHECK_TRACE(PATTERN, Expected),
  405:         fun({ExpectedString, Module, Function}) ->
  406:                 P2 = fun(Received) ->
  407:                              PATTERN = Received,
  408:                              SearchResult =
  409:                                  string:str(lists:flatten(Txt), ExpectedString),
  410:                              case {Module == M, Function == F, SearchResult > 0} of
  411:                                  {true, true, true} ->
  412:                                      true;
  413:                                  _ -> false
  414:                              end
  415:                      end,
  416:                 Result = lists:any(P2, ReceivedPerType),
  417:                 case Result of
  418:                     false ->
  419:                         F = "Trace not found: {~s, ~w, ~w}",
  420:                         ?CT_FAIL(F, [ExpectedString, Module, Function]);
  421:                     _ -> ok
  422:                 end,
  423:                 Result
  424:         end).
  425: 
  426: -define(CHECK_PROCESSED_TRACE(PATTERN, Expected),
  427:         fun(ExpectedString) ->
  428:                 P2 = fun(Received) ->
  429:                              PATTERN = Received,
  430:                              SearchResult =
  431:                                  string:str(lists:flatten(Txt), ExpectedString),
  432:                              SearchResult > 0
  433:                      end,
  434:                 Result = lists:any(P2, ReceivedPerType),
  435:                 case Result of
  436:                     false ->
  437:                         F = "Processed trace not found: ~s",
  438:                         ?CT_FAIL(F, [ExpectedString]);
  439:                     _ -> ok
  440:                 end,
  441:                 Result
  442:         end).
  443: 
  444: check_trace(call, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType) ->
  445:     P1 = ?CHECK_TRACE([Txt, {call, {M, F, _Args}}, _], Expected),
  446:     true = lists:all(P1, ExpectedPerType);
  447: check_trace(return_from, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType) ->
  448:     P1 = ?CHECK_TRACE([Txt, {return_from, {M, F, _Args}, _Return}, _], Expected),
  449:     true = lists:all(P1, ExpectedPerType);
  450: check_trace(exception_from, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType) ->
  451:     P1 = ?CHECK_TRACE([Txt, {exception_from, {M, F, _Args}, _Return}, _], Expected),
  452:     true = lists:all(P1, ExpectedPerType);
  453: check_trace(processed, ExpectedPerType, ReceivedPerType) ->
  454:     P1 = ?CHECK_PROCESSED_TRACE([_Timestamp, _Pid, Txt], Expected),
  455:     true = lists:all(P1, ExpectedPerType);
  456: check_trace(Type, _ExpectedPerType, _ReceivedPerType) ->
  457:     ?CT_FAIL("Type = ~w not checked", [Type]),
  458:     ok.
  459: 
  460: count_line(Filename) ->
  461:     case file:open(Filename, [read]) of
  462:         {ok, IoDevice} ->
  463:             Count = count_line(IoDevice, 0),
  464:             file:close(IoDevice),
  465:             Count;
  466:         {error, Reason} ->
  467:             ?CT_PAL("~s open error  reason:~s~n", [Filename, Reason]),
  468:             ct:fail(Reason)
  469:     end.
  470: 
  471: count_line(IoDevice, Count) ->
  472:     case file:read_line(IoDevice) of
  473:         {ok, _} -> count_line(IoDevice, Count+1);
  474:         eof     -> Count
  475:     end.
  476: 
  477: ssl_connect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  478:     ?CT_LOG("Establishing connection for producing traces", []),
  479:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  480:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  481:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  482:     Server =
  483: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  484: 				   {from, self()},
  485: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  486: 				   {options,  [{keepalive, true},{active, false}
  487: 					       | ServerOpts]}]),
  488:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  489:     Client =
  490: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  491: 				   {host, Hostname},
  492: 				   {from, self()},
  493: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  494: 				   {options, [{keepalive, true},{active, false}
  495: 					      | ClientOpts]}]),
  496:     ?CT_LOG("Testcase ~p, Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [self(), Client, Server]),
  497:     [Server, Client].
